Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-27144 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-21
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-27144 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-21. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.6.1-21, affected by CVE-2025-27144
